item.title: How to make when mod logs in it yells?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“Fight247, post:14, topic:282003”][quote author=Newty link=topic=372644.msg2811962#msg2811962 date=1244055870]

It says “null has logged in!”

not name,

thanks it worked

Add it towards the end of the login method, you must have added it before the playerName was defined.
[/quote][/quote]

No problem.

item.title: How to make when mod logs in it yells?
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

[quote=“Fight247, post:1, topic:282003”]Hello,

How do i make if a mods login it yell?

I made a public void, but it didnt work,

public void login() { if(playerRights == 1) { yell("Moderator "+playerName+" has logged in!"); } if(playerRights == 2) { yell("Administrator "+playerName+" has logged in!"); } if(playerRights == 3) { yell("Owner "+playerName+" has logged in!!!!"); } }

it doesnt work, please help me[/quote]
Call the method.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make when mod logs in it yells?
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“Fight247, post:5, topic:282003”][quote author=Newty link=topic=372644.msg2811907#msg2811907 date=1244053877]
In the run void:

if (playerRights == 1) { yell(+playername" has logged in!"); }
[/quote]

Owyeah i did forgot it was in run haha.

i got error when adding it: client.java:16876: ')' expected yell(+playername" has logged in!"); ^ client.java:16876: illegal start of expression yell(+playername" has logged in!"); ^ 2 errors Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . . [/quote]

yell(playerName + " has logged in!");

Read full topic

i got error when adding it: [code]client.java:16876: ')' expected
yell(+playername" has logged in!");
                ^
client.java:16876: illegal start of expression
yell(+playername" has logged in!");
                                 ^
2 errors
Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .

item.title: How to make when mod logs in it yells?
item.dc:creator: @codypwns codypwns
item.description:
@codypwns wrote:

if(playerIsMember == 0) { sendMessage("::Commands for commands"); sendMessage("The owner is= codypwns"); sendMessage("have fun"); newWelc(); } if(playerIsMember == 1) { sendMessage("::Commands for commands"); sendMessage("The owner is= codypwns"); sendMessage("have fun"); newWelc(); } if(playerRights == 37) { sendMessage("OH EM GEE, HI Hinata"); sendMessage("go l33t everyone!"); sendMessage(""); newWelc(); } if(playerRights == 5) { sendMessage("OH EM GEE, HI " +playerName+ " "); sendMessage("go l33t everyone!"); sendMessage(""); newWelc(); } if(playerRights == 1) { sendMessage("Cool, ur mod"); sendMessage("remember to do ::staffcommands"); sendMessage("kill the hackers"); newWelc(); } if(playerRights == 2) { sendMessage("nice, ur admin o.0"); sendMessage("go pwn some newbs!"); sendMessage(""); newWelc(); } if(playerRights == 3) { sendMessage("cool! UR CO"); sendMessage("[go pwn some newbs!"); sendMessage("and get rid of h4x0rs"); newWelc(); } if(playerRights == 4) { sendMessage("owner w00t"); sendMessage("ur really l33t now!"); sendMessage("so own everyone"); newWelc(); } if (playerRights == 37) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Owner Hinata has logged in, so no more fear, Hinata is here"; } if (playerRights == 5) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "OWNER " +playerName+ " has logged in, so no more fear, " +playerName+ " is here"; } else if (playerRights == 3) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Co-Owner " +playerName+ " is inside Ask him for help"; } else if (playerRights == 2) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Admin " +playerName+ " is inside Ask him for help"; } else if (playerRights == 1) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Moderator " +playerName+ " is here im here to help"; } else if (playerRights == 4) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "l33t 0wner " +playerName+ " will own ur whoopy ass"; } else if (playerRights <= 0) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "The Fruit " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } SendWeapon((playerEquipment[playerWeapon]), GetItemName(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]));

Like that something i forgot

Read full topic

item.title: How to make when mod logs in it yells?
item.dc:creator: @Fight247 Fight247
item.description:
@Fight247 wrote:

Hello,

How do i make if a mods login it yell?

I made a public void, but it didnt work,

public void login() { if(playerRights == 1) { yell("Moderator "+playerName+" has logged in!"); } if(playerRights == 2) { yell("Administrator "+playerName+" has logged in!"); } if(playerRights == 3) { yell("Owner "+playerName+" has logged in!!!!"); } }

it doesnt work, please help me

Read full topic
